This name will be present on the called phone during an incoming call if the display number is set to “IVR” or “both numbers”
Please name your interactive voice response.
When the interactive voice response includes a transfer to an external line, if this call is not picked up before the set time, the call will move onto the next step.
The target phone (the one receiving the call) will show the number of the line dialling the IVR (calling line).
